input.sentences: dad is playing the piano badly .
mom and the boy are playing puzzle on the ground .
the kids are playing puzzle on the ground .

output.sentences: The boy likes playing with a puzzle with his mom.
He also likes playing with the puzzle with other kids.
The flowers were arranged and placed on the table.
Finally it was time to sing "Happy Birthday" and cut the cake.
